Package org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows

This package contains all classes for Swing windows of the user interface (such as menus).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMakeGamePanel
    An abstract class for a panel that is used to start a new instance of GameFromSettings.
    BrowserOpener
    A class for opening a website link in the default browser of the OS.
    InGameMenu
    This class is the in-game menu that the user sees when they open the menu in the game.
    KeyBindsPanel
    This class generates a JPanel that is used by other JFrame windows to allow the user to change the key bindings/assignment in the game.
    NewGamePanel
    A panel for selecting variables for a new instance of game.
    OpenGamePanel
    A panel for selecting a GameSave from the GameSaveList to allow the user to select a saved game file to resume a previously saved game.
    RendererPanel
    A panel that is use for displaying rendering engine setting inside a menu.
    SettingsPanel
    This class is the JPanel for the settings selection by the user.
    StartMenu
    This is the menu that the user sees every single time they start the game.
    TexturePackPanel
    A JPanel for selecting the TexturePack that is used in the game.

Package org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows Description

This package contains all classes for Swing windows of the user interface (such as menus).
Since:
2018-12-23, v0.5
Version:
v1.0
Author:
Alex Kalinins
